item.title: Divina Tragedia
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: [ Editing, Audio Postproduction, Music Production ] Divina Tragedia is about god being bored and making a game show to entertain himself. I Directed, Edited, did the audio postproduction and produced all the music used in the film.
item.content:encoded:
[ Editing, Audio Postproduction, Music Production ]

Divina Tragedia is about god being bored and making a game show to entertain himself.
I Directed, Edited, did the audio postproduction and produced all the music used in the film.

item.title: Laka Lodge
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: [ Camera, Drone Pilot, Editing ] One of the videos created for Laka Lodge, a hotel located in the Comoros. This project consists of one main video (seen here) and 10 smaller videos focused on specific themes. All videos were shot in the Comoros in 3 weeks and edited in Belgium.
item.content:encoded:
[ Camera, Drone Pilot, Editing ]

One of the videos created for Laka Lodge, a hotel located in the Comoros. This project consists of one main video (seen here) and 10 smaller videos focused on specific themes. All videos were shot in the Comoros in 3 weeks and edited in Belgium.

item.title: Inclusive Education
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: [ Camera, Editing ] One of 10 videos created for the NGO Light For The World. All the videos were shot in Rwanda over 6 weeks period and were edited in Belgium and Rwanda. Shot on FS7.
item.content:encoded:
[ Camera, Editing ]

One of 10 videos created for the NGO Light For The World. All the videos were shot in Rwanda over 6 weeks period and were edited in Belgium and Rwanda. Shot on FS7.

item.title: The August Project
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: [ Camera, Editing, Audio Postproduction ] This is the teaser for a 50 min documentary. The August Project is a 50 minute documentary that follows 5 artists who meet for the very first time in Ghent. They sleep and work in the same room, learning how to live together and what live is actually about. […]
item.content:encoded:
[ Camera, Editing, Audio Postproduction ]

This is the teaser for a 50 min documentary.
The August Project is a 50 minute documentary that follows 5 artists who meet for the very first time in Ghent. They sleep and work in the same room, learning how to live together and what live is actually about. It was shot over 7 days and edited in 2-3 months.

item.title: Teleurdeugd
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: [ Directing, 2nd Camera, Editing, Audio postproduction, Effects and animation ] Teleurdeugd speaks about the omnipresent theme of depression and psychological issues without trying to moralize the audience. The film doesn’t offer answers or solutions, instead it invites to reflect on and speak about these problems. It had a theatrical release with 800 sold tickets. […]
item.content:encoded:
[ Directing, 2nd Camera, Editing, Audio postproduction, Effects and animation ]

Teleurdeugd speaks about the omnipresent theme of depression and psychological issues without trying to moralize the audience. The film doesn’t offer answers or solutions, instead it invites to reflect on and speak about these problems. It had a theatrical release with 800 sold tickets. A collaborative project with 5 people that took 2 years.

item.title: Simon x Sara
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: [ Camera, Editing, Drone pilot ] Wedding video created for Simon and Sara. Shot with a one-man team, doing camera and sound on the wedding day. Shot with a Sony a6500 and Ursa Mini 4.6k, lavelier, senheiser 416 and Mavic Pro
item.content:encoded:
[ Camera, Editing, Drone pilot ]

Wedding video created for Simon and Sara. Shot with a one-man team, doing camera and sound on the wedding day. Shot with a Sony a6500 and Ursa Mini 4.6k, lavelier, senheiser 416 and Mavic Pro
